textBeforeTable: Recommended releases Downloads Note that Token module doesn't provide any visible functions to the user on its own, it just provides token handling services for other modules. Tokens are small bits of text that can be placed into larger documents via simple placeholders, like %site-name or [user]. The Token module provides a central API for modules to use these tokens, and expose their own token values. December 31, 2006 at 1:44am Dave Reid on Posted by Token Extend and customize Drupal functionality with contributed modules. If a module doesn't quite do what you want it to do, if you find a bug or have a suggestion, then join forces and help the module maintainer. Or, share your own by starting a new module.
